Plot: During the Edo Period of Japan, an excellent cook marries the heir to a renowned cooking family. However, her husband is a terrible chef. With the help of her new mother-in-law, she begins to teach him the ways of the culinary arts.
Title: A Tale of Samurai Cooking: A True Love Story
Writer: Yûzô Asahara (screenplay), Michio Kashiwada (screenplay), Yukiko Yamamuro (screenplay)
Actors: Aya Ueto, Kengo Kôra, Kimiko Yo, Riko Narumi
